thread.title: Noopur Goel
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Noopur Goel

author: Noopur Goel
title: Noopur Goel
text: Bought a gift basket, and had it shipped directly to my boyfriend for his birthday. He was so excited to receive so much delicious food. Took care of his groceries for at least a month, and gave him the opportunity to try out different things Burger's Smokehouse has to offer (they were already his favorite bacon brand). Would recommend for any man in your life that's a foodie.
